name: So Bow-y Cute
description:
When your parent decides to limit you cuteness potential by prohibiting all bows, you must rebel against their tyranny and become the cutest you possibly can. Be careful not to get caught! or else you're out of luck.

[1.1 UPDATE]

Howdy, Alex here! In the closing moments of Chillennium 2016, I managed to almost finish up a few more details. Therefore, have a 1.1 release!

Changelog

  • You can now be cute in a bunch of different OSes.
  • Added a cool sound that plays when you click buttons (except "skip")
  • Doge
